title: Make Admin panel discoverable and accessible from the main UI

requirements.text: Update the global header navigation so the Admin panel entry point is visible and usable even when the user is not yet authenticated, while still protecting the /admin route with the existing AdminGuard.

quotes: اس ویب سائٹ میں ایڈمن والا آپشن نہیں ہے

acceptanceCriteria: The header shows an "Admin" navigation item on all pages (including when not logged in).
Clicking "Admin" navigates to /admin and, when not authenticated, the existing AdminGuard login prompt is shown.
When authenticated but not an admin, the existing AdminGuard "Access Denied" UI is shown (no unauthorized admin content is rendered).

requirements.text: Add a clear authentication control to the header (using the existing Internet Identity LoginButton) so users can sign in/out without needing to already know the /admin route.

quotes: اس ویب سائٹ میں ایڈمن والا آپشن نہیں ہے

acceptanceCriteria: The header includes a login/logout control that uses the existing Internet Identity flow.
When logged out, the control displays "Login"; when logged in, it displays "Logout".
After login/logout, the UI updates appropriately without requiring a manual refresh (e.g., header state reflects the new auth state).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Do not edit files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose existing hooks/components instead).
Do not weaken admin authorization; /admin must remain protected by AdminGuard and backend role checks.
nonGoals: Implementing a new admin role management UI (e.g., adding/removing admins from the frontend).
Adding non-Internet-Identity authentication methods (email/password, OAuth providers).
Changing backend authorization rules or shipment/admin APIs unless required to fix the missing entry point.
